text: int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { int n , i , j , s = 0 ; int a [ 50005 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; while ( n != 2 ) { if ( a [ 0 ] > a [ 1 ] ) { s = s + a [ 1 ] ; for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) a [ i - 1 ] = a [ i ] ; n = n - 1 ; } else { s = s + a [ 0 ] ; for ( i = 2 ; i < n ; i ++ ) a [ i - 1 ] = a [ i ] ; n = n - 1 ; } } if ( a [ 0 ] > a [ 1 ] ) { s = s + a [ 1 ] ; a [ 0 ] = a [ 1 ] ; n = n - 1 ; } else { s = s + a [ 0 ] ; n = n - 1 ; } printf ( "%d\n" , s ) ; } }
